content: Urakkamillaattha unarvvallllavanaaya ente kartthaave! Ninte unarvvine sthothram cheyyuvaanaayittu paapamuzhukalil ninnu nyangallude urakkatthe unartthaname. Maranamillaattha jeevanullllavane! Ninte karunaye vandippaanaayi maranavum naashavumaakunna urakkatthil ninnu nyangallude maranatthe nee jeevippikkaname. Pithaavum puthranum parishuddharoohaayume! Svargatthilum bhoomiyilum sthuthikkappettavanum vaazhtthappettavanum nee aakayaal ninne sthuthikkunnavaraaya svargeeyamaalaakhamaarude mahatthvamulllla vrndangallodorumichu vishuddhiyodukoodi ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum ninne sthuthichu vaazhtthuvaan nyangalle yogyaraakkaname. Aammeen.
